title: pAhimAm shrI
sahitya:
pAhimAm shrI rAjarAjEshvari amba pAhimAm shrI 
rAjarAjEshvari shrI rAjarAjEshvari shrI rAjarAjEshvari


anupallavi

  simhAsanArUDhE dEvatE drDha vratE simhAsanArUDhE Ehi Ananda hrdayE


caraNam 1    kAmitArtha phaladAyikE ambikE kALikE kAmitArtha phaladAyikE kAmakOTi pIThagatE
    caraNam 2    mAnava munigaNa pAlini mAnini janani bhavAni mAnita guNashAlini niranjani nikhila pApa shamani
    caraNam 3    sArasa padayugaLE svarajati kalpita sangIta rasikE naTapriyE bAlE surabhi puSpamAlE
shAradE sAmagAna sammOditakari shrI cakrarAjEshvari su-layakari shyAmakrSNa sOdari
